articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Spiking memory prices mean that it is once again a horrible time to build a PC - Ars Technica
articles.description: Some RAM kits are over three times as expensive as they were three months ago.

articles.author: Ashley Belanger
articles.title: RealPage agrees to change algorithm so landlords can’t collude on price hikes - Ars Technica
articles.description: RealPage agrees to settle suit over DOJ claims software raised rents across the US.
